name: Single-use Society
description:
This game was created as part of the Games Jobs Live Summer 2021 game jam, I hope you enjoy

The world id drowning in ONE TIME USE items. It is up to you to avert a global crisis!

WELCOME TO SINGLE-USE SOCIETY

In Single-use Society, you must collect the waste people drop in order to create items that will help reduce their reliance on one time use articles.

Collect the plastic bottles to produce green alternative items and use the other waste to fuel the recycling machine. Give each person a new outlook on single-use items before the rubbish dropped reaches critical levels.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move your character and use the mouse to look around
Use E to operate the recycling machine and to interact with litter droppers
Use R to refuel the recycling machine

Assets were created by 255 Pixel Studios

Audio from Zapsplat.com
